infractions.Violation Summary: Windows excluding fire escape windows in a child care service observed without window guards in a child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Peeling lead-based paint or peeling paint of unknown lead content observed in child care facility at time of inspection At time of inspection it was determined that safe work practices were not employed during activity that potentially disturbed lead-based paint or paint of unknown lead content
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed that child care service failed to provide appropriate guards on designated structures/equipment to protect children from potential injury

infractions.Violation Summary: Proper ventilation not provided or maintained at time of inspection Indoor air quality nuisance allowed to exist at time of inspection

infractions.Violation Summary: Exits and other egress not provided with required signage at time of inspection
